headline: Show HN: Lb – Opinionated Media Library
description:
I finally figured out how to publish as a python package. I use this multiple times a day the past few months. It controls all of my media consumption.

I am very much anti-Spotify and I am eternally grateful for the `pychromecast` and `catt` python libraries which allow me to easily play music through my house with my Google speaker groups.

I have been backing up a lot of YouTube videos recently so this helps me to loop through them--it's my own hacky auto-play.

It probably won't work well on WSL or Windows
